name: Project for Equity, Representation, and Governance
description: The Project for Equity, Representation, and Governance (PERG) seeks to apply its normative commitments to the goals of full and active democratic representation, equality across the spectrum of policy programs, and efficiency and efficacy in the full array of aspects of governance within a wide variety of public policy concerns. The substantive commitments of the Project for Equity, Representation, and Governance transcend our noted concern for educational parity among minority students, teachers, and administrators.
